definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The Zebrafish DVD Exchange Project is aimed at by-passing these limitations.
sentences.chinese: 斑馬魚DVD交換計劃旨在繞過這些限制。

sentences.english: In this experiment, zebrafish are exposed to a dye that highlights living hair cells.
sentences.chinese: 在他們的實驗中，斑馬魚身上活的毛細胞被染色。

sentences.english: Finally, the acute toxicity of the ethyl acetate polar fraction to non-targets was studied with zebra fish.
sentences.chinese: 測定垂序商陸葉極性部位對斑馬魚的急性毒性。

sentences.english: They study genes that are "conserved" between zebrafish and humans.
sentences.chinese: 他們研究的基因爲斑馬魚和人類之間是“保守”的。

sentences.english: Acute toxicity on non-target organisms was determined using Zebrafish as a bioindicator.
sentences.chinese: 用斑馬魚急性毒性試驗考察其對非靶生物的毒性。

sentences.english: As with humans, zebra fish skin colour is determined by pigment cells, which contain melanosomes.
sentences.chinese: 人類認爲，斑馬魚皮膚的顏色是黑色色素細胞決定的。
